snippet: A federal agency said it would suspend action against the University of Alabama at Birmingham, which it said did not adequately tell parents about risks to their premature infants enrolled in a research trial.
abstract: Federal Office for Human Research Protections announces that it will suspend action against University of Alabama at Birmingham, which it said did not adequately inform patients about risks to their premature infants of enrollment in large research trial.
lead_paragraph: A federal agency said it would suspend action against the University of Alabama at Birmingham, which it said did not adequately tell parents about risks to their premature infants enrolled in a research trial.
